response.explain: The previous action code resulted in an execution error because the robot was trying to open a fridge which was already open, as the state 'openable' of the fridge was not 1, meaning it's open.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot close to the brisket.
(2) Pick up the brisket.
(3) Move the robot to the front of the oven.
(4) Open the oven.
(5) Put the brisket inside the oven.
(6) Close the oven.
(7) Cook the brisket.
(8) Open the oven.
(9) Take out the brisket.
(10) Move the robot back to its original position.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    #Subtask 1: Move the robot close to the brisket
